activities:
Securely store information on servers and do nothing with it.

Sometimes, we may specifically ask for information about you when you request more information on our products or sign up to use a service. We will need certain information -- such as name, Internet address or screen name, billing address, type of computer, -- in order to provide that service or product to you.
